name: Bombevo
description:
A mysterious UFO appear and planning to attack the earth! Can you stop it?
Bombevo is a strategic match 3 games.
Match 3 resource tile to upgrade it, and double click to use it. You can use money (yellow tile) to increase score and remove a tile, and other colored tile (red, blue, green tile) to attack the UFO.

You can only attack them once before they retaliate, so upgrade your weapon as much as possible before launching any weapon!
